synopsis.text: In the twilight of the Edo era, Japan is caught in the throes of the industrial revolution and a power struggle between the ruling Shogunate and those seeking change. Amidst this chaos, a clandestine group of samurai emerges, armed with advanced weaponry and fueled by a burning desire to end the tyranny of the oppressive regime. By day, one of these warriors, Ichimatsu, leads a seemingly ordinary life working at a local tavern and frequenting brothels. But as night falls, he transforms into a formidable force, dispensing justice with his powerful firearms. As a member of the enigmatic "Samurai Gun," Ichimatsu is on a personal quest for vengeance, while also striving to protect the innocent and shape the future of Japan. With the odds stacked against them, these revolutionary samurai must confront the moral complexities of their mission and the escalating challenges that lie ahead.
